Chicago.DoubleTree by Hilton Chicago Magnificent:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Chicaco Magnificent Mile is a Doubletree Hotel franchise located near Chicago's "Magnificent Mile."


== Location ==
The Doubletree Hotel Magnificent Mile is located on the corner of Ohio Street and Fairbanks in close proximity to the Magnificent Mile, Navy Pier, Millennium Park and McCormick Place.


== History ==
The 294-foot 29-story hotel was built by Hillman, Vagniers & Associates in 1974. It was originally a 495-room Holiday Inn City Centre until the hotel was rebranded as a Doubletree hotel in 2008.
